text: Bjørg Løhner Øien (10 May 1928 - 20 February 2015)Bjørg Løhner Øien's obituary was a Norwegian figure skater. She competed at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo. She was Norwegian champion in figure skating in 1952. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" |- ! title: Bjørg Løhner Øien
